pitt_walk.premise: This is a super simple XML document designed to illustrate one strategy for using XSLT geospatial information from an XML document and output it in a geojson file.

body.day: Today I sat at Commonplace Coffee to have a super trendy matcha latte. Then I spent a few hours at the rock gym, before making my way to campus.
The next day I started at Posvar before going to the gym.
